author: Luis Pablo de la Horra
title: No to Wasteful Coronavirus Stimulus, Yes to Social Insurance
description: Policymakers and central banks can cushion the crisis's blow, but they must act wisely. The post No to Wasteful Coronavirus Stimulus, Yes to Social Insurance appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Policymakers and central banks can cushion the crisis's blow, but they must act wisely.It all began in December of last year when a hospital in Wuhan, the most populous city in Central China, reported a number of pneumonia cases of unknown origin. A few days … [+6235 chars]
